metadata.synopsis: The character comments after picking up the fake copy of the Blood of Lathander (a replica of the stone that's inside the actual Blood of Lathander mace). They are disappointed by it, indicating there might be more to this story.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 1379; -10; -663 on CRE_Main_A- Turn on "Roll Amazing"- Pick up S_CRE_FakeBloodOfLathander- Pass the religion check

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Is this it? Seems a little underwhelming for a holy relic.
